Action.author: mattraffel
Action.body: this creates a potential circular dependency that will make it difficult to do. either you have broken tests until the wrapper can be updated or you have to do the work twice to keep tests working.

Action.author: gudkov
Action.body: ~MattRaffel It isn't rust wrapper is only test dependency and tests are depend on both libindy and rust wrapper.

Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: Available in master since https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/pull/1313 has been merged
